Package org.cyclops.evilcraft.core.blockentity.tickaction

Interface ITickAction<T extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity>

Type Parameters:
T - Subclass of TileEntity
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccumulateItemTickAction, BloodInfuserTickAction, BoxCookTickAction, BulkRepairItemTickAction, EmptyFluidContainerInTankTickAction, EmptyInTankTickAction, FluidContainerItemTickAction, InfuseItemTickAction, ReanimateTickAction, RepairItemTickAction
public interface ITickAction<T extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.BlockEntity>
An action that can be given to TickComponents which are used inside BlockEntityTickingTankInventory

  • Method Details

    • canTick

      boolean canTick(T tile, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack itemStack, int slot, int tick)
      If this action can tick for the given conditions.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile entity that ticks.
      itemStack - The ItemStack that is in the slot for which this ticker runs.
      slot - The slot ID for the ticker.
      tick - The current tick.
      Returns:
      If the action can tick for the given parameters.

    • onTick

      Add one tick.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile entity that ticks.
      itemStack - The ItemStack that is in the slot for which this ticker runs.
      slot - The slot ID for the ticker.
      tick - The current tick.

    • getRequiredTicks

      float getRequiredTicks(T tile, int slot, int tick)
      Get the required conditions for the given conditions.
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile entity that ticks.
      slot - The slot ID for the ticker.
      tick - The current tick.
      Returns:
      Get the required ticks for the given slot for the given tile.
